snippet.title: Ni no Kuni : Full Animation Video
snippet.description:
Explore Ni no Kuni: Cross Worlds as a Soul Diver!
A hero caught in between two worlds,
will you have what it takes to save both?
Embark on epic quest to unlock the mysteries of The Nameless Kingdom,
adopt a familiar and test your skills!  

Pre-register Now! 
https://ntiny.link/ninokunicw1

Learn more at: https://ninokuni.netmarble.com/en

- Discord: https://discord.gg/ninokuni-official
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/ninokuni_global
- Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@ninokuni_official
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ninokuni
- Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHiycGyJBPzo0l9sJwVVsrQ

#Netmarble #NinoKuniCrossWorlds #Anime #Animation #NinoKuni #Ghibli #JRPGJoeHisaishi
